submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        ls = []
        cnt = Counter()
        i, j = 0, n - 1
        while i < j:
            cnt[abs(nums[j] - nums[i])] += 1
            ls.append(max(k - min(nums[j], nums[i]), nums[i], nums[j]))
            i += 1
            j -= 1
        ls.sort()
        ans = inf
        # v 0 n // 2 - bisect_right(ls, x) - v  1  bisect_right(ls, x - 1) 2
        for x, v in cnt.items():
            ans = min(ans, n // 2 + bisect_right(ls, x - 1) - v)
        return ans
